job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: In this role you will be building the next generation ML systems that transform the way people find what they love As a Machine Learning Engineer your focus will be on building productionizing and scaling of machine learning models and promoting engineering excellencebrbrYou will get the opportunity to work with data scientists and engineers as well as lead work crossfunctionally with Strategy Product Merchandising Marketing and Engineering partners to build and enhance those capabilitiesbrbrstronguHere Are Some Examples Of Teams You Might Have The Opportunity To JoinbrbrustrongMultiple teams are looking for machine learning engineersbrulliCore Representation Learning this team builds general purpose recommendation systems to understand our clients preferences across style size and fit The teams recommendations are used for personalization across a variety of downstream algorithms and applications eg style shuffle shop recommendations outfit generation and home feed personalizationliliFreestyle recommendation team builds recommendation systems and ranking for the Freestyle product including product description page and carousels liliOutfits team outfits are one of the core capabilities of our personalized shopping experience Outfits make it easy for customers to see which items go together so they dont have to spend time sifting through hundreds of options Because outfits make shopping simpler and easier they are a prioritized part of our businessliliStyling recommendations we build models that score the best items for clients to be used to enable other teams to transform the way clients find the clothes they lovebrliulstronguYoure Excited About This Opportunity Because You WillbrustrongulliBring your engineering excellence to improve how we serve real time recommendations in production at scale liliMake a substantial impact on personalization across multiple dimensions by creating the infrastructure that allows us to build the next generation of recommendation systemsliliCollaborate with data scientists on a variety of sophisticated machine learning algorithmsliliWork closely with partners in ML Platform Eng Engineering Product and Merchandising teamsliliBe empowered to take initiative and follow your innate curiositybrliulstronguWere Excited About You BecausebrustrongulliYou are familiar with Python and modern ML frameworks such as PyTorch or TensorFlowliliYou are familiar with the fundamentals of ML in at least one of these areas supervised learning recommendation systems or deep learningliliYou have experience building deploying and maintaining high performing resilient and scalable real time machine learning systemsliliYou are a clear communicator who can get buyin from partners and you are excited to be part of a teamliliYou are curious inspired to take on new challenges and calculated risks liliYou care about the system level implications of our work eg ethical concerns for clients stylists warehouse workers etcbrliulstrongWhy youll love working at Stitch FixbrstrongulliWe are a group of people who are bright kind and motivated by challenges You can be your authentic self here and are empowered to encourage others to do the same liliWe are a successful fastgrowing company at the forefront of tech and fashion redefining retail for the next generationliliWe are a technology and datafirst businessliliWe believe in autonomy amp taking initiativeliliWe take what we do seriously but we dont take ourselves too seriouslyliliWe offer competitive compensation packages and comprehensive health benefitsliliWe are proud to say that we work for Stitch Fix and know that the work we do brings joy to our clients every daybrliulstronguAbout Stitch FixbrbrustrongAt Stitch Fix were about personal styling for everybody and we believe in both a service and a workplace where you can be your best most authentic self Were the first fashion retailer to combine technology and data science with the human instinct of a Stylist to deliver a deeply personalized shopping experience This novel juxtaposition attracts a highly diverse group of talented people who are both thinkers and doers All of this results in a simple powerful offering to our customers and a successful growing business serving millions of men women and kids We believe we are only scratching the surface on our opportunity and were looking for incredible people like you to help us carry on that trend
